english.segment1: Like I said. Leave your baggage at the back door. I'm leaving you the way I think it should be. We're always pulling into places that we can't back out of. Starting fights we can't talk our way out of them
english.segment2: How does it feel to be on the recieving end of this one?
english.segment3: I'm half way there and it's all on me. This is what I get for wanting more. This is the way it has to be. Dancing on all these changes. So I walk around with this rope in my hand
english.segment4: So I'll tie it around and around. I'll tie me down
english.segment5: I'll fantasize of being manic. And leaving us behind. In your eyes you were the one that tried
english.segment6: Acceptance is what holds us here. And you my dear are the one I fear tonight. We'll try just one more time
english.segment7: This is the moment that we all live for. Are you ready?
english.segment8: I'm half way there and it's all on me. This is what I get for wanting more. This is the way it has to be. Dancing on all these changes. So I walk around with this rope in my hand
english.segment9: So I'll tie it around and around. I'll tie me down
english.segment10: You cant see past my waving hands. just running away again
english.segment11: You think so loud it hurts my ears.. I want to know how to get through this. Without choking up. I can't feel you. You're so far from me
english.segment12: I'm half way there and it's all on me
